decree.translation[0].definitions[0].def: an official order or decision, especially one made by the ruler of a country
decree.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The Emperor issued the decree repealing martial law.
decree.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a judgment in a court of law
decree.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to make an official judgment or give an official order
decree.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: The King decreed that there should be an end to the fighting.
decree.translation[2].definitions[0].def: a judgement made in a court of law after a CIVIL action
decree.translation[2].definitions[0].exa: The council had already been successful in obtaining a court decree against the former MP.
decree.translation[2].definitions[1].def: in certain forms of government, an order from a president, minister etc that has the force of a law
decree.translation[2].definitions[1].exa: The president issued a decree on January 26, ordering the re-registration of all political parties.
